item.title: China tariff live updates: Trump blasts Beijing as 'PANICKED' while markets continue to drop
item.description: China retaliated against Trump's tariffs with its own 34% levy. U.S. markets dropped on the news.

item.title: Trump open to tariff negotiations, contradicting White House aides
item.description: Trump's tariff fallout starts with layoffs, price hikes and trade war tensions, driving a broad market sell-off.

item.title: Trump tariffs are 'pure madness' and the European Union should not comply, former Italian PM says
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's so-called 'Liberation Day' trade tariffs are "madness, pure madness", according to former Italian Prime Minister Enrico ...

item.title: South Korea's Constitutional Court upholds impeachment of President Yoon, ousting him from office
item.description: This starts a 60-day countdown where an election must be held to select the next president.

item.title: What Trump says he's trying to accomplish with tariffs
